Hope you enjoy this~

Privado is Minimalist and Responsive Blogging Theme for Ghost based on Twitter Bootstrap.
Privado comes with every possible features of Ghost.

Some of the Salient Features of Privado

  • Clean and Minimal Design
  • Responsive for every device
  • Dynamic Navigation Menu
  • Disqus Comment Integrated
  • Mailchimp Newsletter Integrated
  • Featured Post Option
  • Sidebar with number of choices
  • Beautiful Custom Error Page
  • Author Page, Tag Page, Static Page available
  • Unique Piece of Design

It's easy to customize each and every option of Privado just following the rich documentation. If you face any technical issue, our support is an email away!

Purchase Now
